postScript:
:SET &RID# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*EXITCODE=*")
:PROCESS &RID#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&RID#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &EXITCODE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &EXITCODE# = ADD(&EXITCODE#,1)
:  SET &EXITCODE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&EXITCODE#)
:  PUBLISH &EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW
!:  IF &EXITCODE# > 0
!:    MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800
!:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

processingCommand.script:
# DELETE DEPLOYMENT

import requests
import json
import os
import getpass
import sys
import time

user = str(getpass.getuser())
host = str(os.uname()[1])
print(">> Login URL: ${MCLOUD_LOGIN_URL#}")
print(">> Login API URL: ${MCLOUD_LOGIN_API_URL#}")
print(">> Delete deployment URL: ${MCLOUD_DELETE_URL#}")

# GET REFRESH TOKEN
def getRefreshToken():
  print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
  print("Getting refresh token ...")
  print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")

  username="${IN_MCLOUD_USERNAME#}"
  password="${IN_MCLOUD_PASSWORD#}"
  headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
  data = {"username":"${IN_MCLOUD_USERNAME#}","password":"${IN_MCLOUD_PASSWORD#}","domain":"prg-dc.dhl.com","scope":""}
  url = "${MCLOUD_LOGIN_URL#}"

  try:
    resp = requests.post(url, data=json.dumps(data), auth=(username, password), headers = headers)
    jsonResponse = json.loads(resp.text)
    refreshToken = jsonResponse["refresh_token"]
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    print("refreshToken = " + refreshToken)
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    return refreshToken
  except Exception as e:
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    print("ERROR: Unable to get refresh token!")
    print(e)
    print("EXITCODE=1")
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    exit(1)

# GET ACCESS TOKEN
def getAccessToken(refreshToken):
  print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
  print("Getting access token ...")
  print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")

  data = {"refreshToken":"" + refreshToken +""}
  url = "${MCLOUD_LOGIN_API_URL#}"
  headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
  try:
    resp = requests.post(url, data=json.dumps(data), headers = headers)
    jsonResponse = json.loads(resp.text)
    accessToken = jsonResponse["token"]
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    print("accessToken = " + accessToken)
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    return accessToken
  except Exception as e:
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    print("ERROR: Unable to get access token!")
    print(e)
    print("EXITCODE=1")
    print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
    exit(1)
    
# DELETE DEPLOYMENT
refreshToken = getRefreshToken()
accessToken = getAccessToken(refreshToken)

print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
print("Deleting deployment '${IN_DEPLOYMENT_ID#}' ...")
print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")

data = {"actionId":"Deployment.custom.delete.immediately",
           "inputs":{
              "preApproved":True
            },
            "reason":"Rebuild OS"
}

headers = {"Authorization": "Bearer " + str(accessToken) + "", "Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
url = "${MCLOUD_DELETE_URL#}"
try:
  resp = requests.post(url, data=json.dumps(data), headers = headers)
  jsonResponse = json.loads(resp.text)
  print(resp.text)
  print("deploymentId=" + str(jsonResponse["deploymentId"]))
  print("EXITCODE=0")
  exit()
except Exception as e:
  print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
  print("ERROR: Unable to delete deployment with ID '${IN_DEPLOYMENT_ID#}'!")
  print(e)
  print("EXITCODE=1")
  print("------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
  exit(1)
